hero_section.title: Authentic Taralli, Crafted with Passion in Tunisia
hero_section.description: Experience the true taste of the Mediterranean with our traditionally made, high-quality taralli.

why_choose_us.title: Why Choose Us?
why_choose_us.natural_description: Made with the finest, all-natural ingredients with no preservatives.
why_choose_us.mediterranean_description: An authentic flavor that transports you to the sunny coasts of Tunisia.
why_choose_us.handmade_description: Crafted with passion and care in small batches for the perfect crunch.
why_choose_us.direct_to_you_description: From our artisanal kitchen directly to your table, ensuring freshness.

about_section.description_part1: Gusto Club Tunisie was born from a love for authentic Mediterranean flavors and a passion for Tunisian craftsmanship. We believe in simple, high-quality ingredients and time-honored traditions to create taralli that are not just a snack, but an experience.
about_section.description_part2: Our values are simple: Quality, Tradition, and Passion. Every batch is handmade with care, ensuring a delicious, crunchy bite every time.

contact_section.contact_description: Have a question, a wholesale inquiry, or just want to say hello? Drop us a line!
contact_section.newsletter_description: Get exclusive offers and be the first to know about new products.
contact_section.message_sent_success: Your message has been sent successfully!
contact_section.message_send_failed: Failed to send message. Please try again.
contact_section.newsletter_subscribed_success: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter!
